name: Good Girl Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family: Floral..Scent Type: Warm Florals..Key Notes: Tuberose, Jasmine, Tonka Bean..Fragrance Description: Black and whiteu2026 good girl, bad girl. GOOD GIRL is a sensual, evocative fragrance born of the beautiful contradictions and the ever-present duality of modern women and modern life. Both freshly light and moodily dark, this innovative fragrance captures a womans wondrous complexity with surprising and exceptional ingredients. The sweet, alluring qualities of jasmine give GOOD GIRL its brightness and femininity. The darker side is created with richly fragrant cocoa and intoxicating tonka. Almond and coffee bring the scent its immediate vibrancy. Tuberose, extracted in a new way that creates a rich delicacy, is the fragrances wild card, bringing fluidity and femininity. GOOD GIRL exemplifies the effortless elegance and wit of the House of Herrera...The ground-breaking bottle, the first in the form of a high heel, speaks as eloquently of the power of modern femininity and a womans dual nature as the fragrance itself. Made of sleek, smoky, midnight blue glass, it stands on the tallest, thinnest gold heel...Give a girl the right shoe and she can conquer the world.u2014Carolina Herrera de Bu00e1ez, Brand Founder
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Fragrance, Water, Linalool, Hydroxycitronellal, Benzyl Salicylate, Coumarin, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Benzyl Benzoate, Ethylhexyl Saliclate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Limonen, Geraniol, Citronellol, Isoeugenol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Alcohol, Citral, Ci 60730 (Ext. Violet 2) Alcohol Of Vegatal Origin 80%.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The fragrance of Good Girl has enthralled me and climbed to the top few of my favourite fragrances. The story that Good Girl tells is one filled with duality, offering a sense of sensual play with a hint of mystery. It holds a balance between a friendly smile and captivating gaze; its the classic tale of unrequited love or a love that keeps you wanting and needing more.   It has a delectable, almost forbidden sweetness to it buried in the whimsically curious tones of bergamot and musk. It has a mature and even toned presence thanks to the grounding notes of coffee and sandalwood, with the feminine addition of geranium rose and jasmine. The base notes of cacao, praline & vanilla make it approachable allowing for the alluring desire it creates to pull others in. This is the fragrance of a women who knows what she wants.   In my experience, its long lasting with notes that are still detachable with 6-8 hours of wear time or more, especially with well moisturized skin. It has a moderate to strong silage leaning more toward moderate, those around you will be able to pick up the fragrance but its not overly vivacious. I wouldnt place this scent in any season category but it does carry a flirty and zestful demeanour so it feels more romantic and evening friendly than it would for the office.  This is a fragrance for any woman whos heard the term u201cu2026 but you look like such a good girl.u201d

reviews.review_text: I received this fragrance in return for my honest opinion. The minute you open the box you fall in love with the impactful and stunning bottle shape. The high heel bottle is elegant and makes for the perfect decoration. Even when my bottle is empty I will be keeping it because it looks so neat! The bottle itself is a mysterious smoky midnight blue glass and the sleek gold heel is the finishing touch! I spent years walking around Sears during the holiday season demoing fragrances so I like to think I have some knowledge when it comes to fragrances and Id have to say this one would be a top seller this holiday season and beyond. The scent itself is sweet yet not to sweet. Its in the floral family and its key ingredients are Tuberose, Jasmine & Tonka Bean. On first spritz I absolutely loved the scent but found once it dried down it wasnt the absolute best scent for me. As with most fragrances it reacts differently once its on your skin. Thats why some fragrances smell differently on each person. Ill still wear it just not an every day scent. If I spray it on my clothes it still smells beautiful just remember not to spray all perfumes on white clothes because some fragrances can stain white or light coloured clothing. Another great thing about this fragrance is the scent lasts all day. In all I think this is a wonderful fragrance and the bottle itself offers a fantastic curb appeal!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good Girl is a lovely, complex fragrance.  Upon first spraying it, I was hit with an alarming alcohol smell that faded nearly immediately into a jasmine and citrus infusion. A little bit of lemon, and something bordering on bergamot. After this upper layer fades, which happens fairly quickly. the perfume moves into it's more enduring notes, which are much more gourmand. Starting with an almond note, and then into a heavier coffee, cocoa, praline, and slight floral mixture. It has a very heady musky sweetness. It reminds me of a really lovely incense. It finalizes with a woodsy, cedary smell, that is a little spicy and even more musky. These final notes really only make an appearance when the fragrance is sprayed on clothes, where the longevity is much longer than when sprayed on the skin. However, personally I preferred the way the perfume wore on my skin as compared to clothes.   So who is this fragrance for? It is certainly feminine, however I think some men and certainly non-binary folks could really love this. It has a really lovely gourmand/floral sweetness to it, but it's also heavy, mysterious, complex, and deep enough to skew unisex. It could be either mature or youthful depending on the person wearing it- no age barriers in my opinion. I would definitely stick to wearing it in cooler temperatures, as I think that same musky heaviness could be a little overwhelming in warmer temperatures- unless of course wearing a fragrance with a beastly sillage to some hot sweaty club is a power move for you, in which case this is totally the ticket.   In terms of the packaging, there's more to it than the ICONIC shoe design. The sprayer is fabulous! It has, legitimately, the smoothest, most satisfying spray I've ever experienced.   I think there are people this frag would be too much for, honestly, and so for that reason I can't recommend this as a completely blind buy- if you know that muskier frags can be a headache trigger for you, I'd steer clear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: By far my favorite fragrance. I got the 1oz just to try it and I wish I would have just got the full size. I use it everyday. I have been on the hunt for my signature fragrance and this is the first one on my fragrance journey and I have since got several minis and samples but I keep coming back to this one. I lean more towards woody and spicy with a hint of sweetness fragrances. And this one hit all marks in an unexpected way. I cant stand most floral fragrances but the floral notes in this are balanced so well with all the other notes. Its definitely mostly warm sweet but not overly so the dry down (my favorite part of all fragrances) is soft woody vanilla. I can smell the few floral notes all the way through but more in the back ground which gives it some complexity. The coffee and almond isnt over done either like black opium. I like black opium too but its almost too sweet like when you accidentally put too much sugar in you coffee but Good Girl is balanced soooo well! I love it so much I just wish all those great notes lingered a little longer like my long time favorite and old signature fragrance decadence.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The iconic Good Girl... what can I say? It's a cult classic for a reason.  It's a sensual smell, save this one for night time/ dates.  Everyone will ask you what you wear.  It's unique but feminine. Dark and erotic smelling, this scent will leave everyone around you drooling. It's ironic that it is named Good Girl when I imagine the women to be wearing this to be provocative, dark and sensual. If you like to smell strong, unique and sexy, buy this.  The full size bottle is stunning but always buy a roller or sampler size first never blind buy babes!!!!

reviews.review_text: I am honestly not a gourmand person but this is one of the very few I like. It is definitely sweet but well-rounded by the floral notes and the cedar/patchouli in the base. Especially appreciate the almond note, though. It is one of the most detectable notes to my nose. Its a more earthy almond rather than sweet and marzipan-y. In addition to almond, I most prominently smell coffee, cacao, and praline. There is A LOT going on in this fragrance's composition, but somehow it works. I find this to be a pretty unique scent as well. In my opinion, it is best for cooler weather, most suitable for nighttime, but pleasant and not too overpowering for daytime wear as well. Not sure if this will be everyones cup of tea though but it does definitely stand out in my opinion.

reviews.review_title: More dark, deep Sensual; NOT Fruity or Floral

reviews.review_text: Ive had the largest size in this perfume for quite a few years now lol. A large size of perfume is really economical for me, because it lasts me forever. And it smelled all right enough in the store. Employee said it was their best seller. Bottle was super odd and neat and cute. But I cant really describe the smell. Its not fruity or floral at all. Theres some kind of almost sensual deep musky smell with it, and be careful with the sprays, cause she lasts and lasts and lastsu2026 especially on clothes. My kid loves perfume. She wanted one spray of it last night while playing pretend. I barely even gave her not even half a spritz, and sprayed it to the side of her neck with her shirt collar pulled down, so that what I sprayed, all of the half a spritz wouldnt even hit her neck, and most of it would go just into the air kinda near her (cause I worry about spraying perfume really on any of the kids and usually try to use all natural products with them, with the least amount of chemicals possible). She already had her pajamas on before bed, and today is just a couple days before Xmas, so shes kinda prowled around the house in her PJs today, since we werent going anywhere today. Sthought she was sooo big when she got that barely even a half a spritz put on, lol. Well, her shirt collar somehow rubbing against that area at some point in the night has made her shirt smell like it from a mile away, and I can still smell it all over her. I smells I mean, pretty good to be. But its like a strong sense of this sexy, deep, dark, sensual smelling stuff. Not sweet or fruity or floral AT ALL. Not even a little. Til I can find a new signature scent (mine WAS formerly YSL Black Opium Floral Shock. Hate the regular Black Opium, but Floral Shock was sooo so so good for the type of scent profile I like. Except it was stolen from me a few months back). So thank God I had this bottle as a backup, while Ive been on the prowl for something else, or Id have had no perfume.

reviews.review_text: i been wanting a good perfume and decided to go with this one. It smells amazing like seriously amazing. I'd describe this scent is fresh sexy and warm. It starts off with this beautiful freshness then as it drys down it has sweetness some musk and a little spicy kinda scent. When going in store they can only spray it on paper so not being able to actually spray it on my wrist is where this perfume kinda disappoints. I read reviews on this perfume where other people was saying it doesn't last. I figured we all have different skin types different chemistry. I figured I'd still buy it. This lasted 2 hours on my skin after that it was like I was never even wearing this perfume. It leaves no scent behind at all for $100.00 dollars I expected this to last a long time. Now it does last forever on clothes which is great that is last somewhere. But to me they need to go back and figure out how they can make this last longer. This was my first perfume I bought. I usually buy body sprays because spending a $100.00 on perfume you expect it to last. I even sprayed this on my neck and wrist like 4 times to see maybe its just a light perfume and adding more will do something and it didn't. I got b&bw body sprays that last all day on my skin and clothes so why can't this last longer. I probably won't buy this again when I run out even tho. the scent is amazing and intoxicating. I can't justify paying that much again for something not to last at least 8 hours or more. I hope they hear their customers and try and find a way to make this last.

reviews.review_text: Let me say the first few times I smelled this on blotter paper, I didn't like it at all. It smelled like funky beach or watery, something I can't quite put right words on. I couldn't understand why people liked it.  Out of sheer curiosity and stubbornness, I decided to actually wear it and let it do it's thing to the complete dry down. It was then it alllll made sense. I bought a full size. True the top notes are not my thing but when it goes through it's magical changes it is worth it. I find I keep smelling my wrist through day. Give it a chance if you find opening is not appealing. It really does change. Everyone's chemistry is different I realize, I just know for me, I had to really let it mix with me. The longevity is probably the best of any perfume I own. It doesn't bother my allergies at all and so glad I didn't write it off. I am very picky, I won't buy something I don't totally want to wear. It's a keeper and I feel beautiful when I wear it. I don't have many perfumes I love, this is one I do.

While it does have excellent longevity and throw, the notes of this scent have a more universal appeal than my signature. The best word I could use to describe it is pretty. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this perfume early 2018, and I have to say... it is SO INTRIGUING. First of all, I think the high heel perfume bottle is so creative and SO GLAMOROUS. So special! Of all the perfumes in my collection, this stands out and catches the eye first. Such a statement piece and so gift-worthy! As for the actual scent, that is not an after-thought whatsoever. Good Girl, a refreshingly sweet combination of tuberose, jasmine, and tonka bean, lasts so long upon my skin. I catch whiffs of it hours after application and just smile. In spite of the fact that I have a number of perfumes on rotation, this doesn't smell like any of the others. Carolina Herrera's best scent ever! Wonderful in every way :)

reviews.review_title: Good Girl is great in my opinion
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First off, the bottle. I initially didnt like it. That is, until I actually got it. Ive come to appreciate it now for its uniqueness, and I cant help but feel luxurious when holding it. I love the scent because its not super florally, despite having tuberose and jasmine. The coffee and almonds even it out to a warm and sweet floral scent, somewhat in gourmand territory. If you like Alien by Mugler, youll probably like this. I personally dont notice the scent that much, but apparently others around me do. My best friend and mother tell me all the time that they can smell it and that it smells like me as a perfume. Which is kinda strange to hear, but I understand what theyre getting at. The scent lasts a few hours before I cant smell it on my wrists, however Id say thats pretty good compared to past perfumes Ive had, which only lasted an hour. Overall, it works really well for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Jasmine is the strongest note, in my opinion. It's a nice perfume but too floral for me- the floral in it is a bit sickly like a bouquet that's a week old and needs to be tossed. I also am not a fan of the rollerball and wish it was an atomizer. The rollerball is good but leaves so much liquid on my wrist I'm left blowing it to dry or dabbing it all over my other arm to get it to dry down.  If you're into perfumes, you'll find this to smell very similar to most of the Valentino perfumes. Extremely floral, feminine and expensive smelling. It's very grown up and I wouldn't put this on a woman under 40 (I'm a 31yo woman who loves gourmands and some floral perfumes). It's an inoffensive fragrance and very office appropriate- some may find it too mature. Sorry! I know that Good Girl has a ton of fans but it's pretty mediocre and a bit too mature in my book.   For reference, the scents I buy over and over include: Hugo Boss For Her, Tom Ford Noir Pour Femme, YSL Black Opium,  Marc Jacobs Decadence,  YSL Mon Paris,  Clean Neroli,  Atelier Cologne Mandarin,  Lancome La Vie Est Belle,  Lalique Amethyst,  Elizabeth and James Bourbon. I avoid most Dior and Gucci perfumes!

reviews.review_title: top five winter scents..just doesn't last long
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: omg!! I loveeee this scent. the last few months I have found myself gravitating towards warmer, sweet scents like cinnamon and vanilla or caramel notes. and I usually love more sweet floral scents. my favorite of all time for winter are Michael Kors Wanderlust and Giorgio Armani Si. just for some background..anyway, I love this scent. the first thing I smell is the tonka bean, which gives me that cinnamon almost warmth that I've been loving lately. I was looking for a scent a few days ago at a fragrance counter and I told the lady I want to find similar scents to Good Girl, like with warm cinnamon notes and she looks at me like I had 5 heads..cinnamon?? that's unheard of in perfume.she said..but it's really not..I mean our noses are all different and when tonka bean notes and vanilla notes are mixed with certain other ingredients, they can give off almost a cinnamon scent. DONT DOUBT YOUR NOSES LADIES..lol.   Ugh I love this scent, it's not for the young girls..I'm 27 and I wouldn't have liked this perfume in high school..I was wearing Juicy in school..so it just depends how you want to smell..I like to think of Good Girl as a hug in a bottle..  I just wish it lasted longer. I find it doesn't last very long on me..and luckily scents tend to last days on me if I'm not careful or if I spray clothing or a jacket, it lingers for days. but not Good girl..its so sad. For the price it should really stay put!

reviews.review_text: GOOD GIRL! Wow. Im the kind of person whose skin doesnt u2018mix right with most perfumes. So I have only a few go-to perfumes that u2018work on me: Creme dNude by MAC; u2018Saint by Kat Von D, and u2018Pure Grace by Philosophy (whose newer formulation lasts only about 45 minutes.) So when I got a sample of GOOD GIRL in a recent Sephora purchase, I was skeptical. Im known for giving away great samples and minis because they just dont cooperate with my ginger-girl skin. I sprayed two tiny pumps of GOOD GIRL and it was love at first sniff. This is a very sexy, sophisticated scent that really turns heads. Two men, complete strangers, asked me at different times what kind of perfume I wear, because they wanted to buy it for their wives! It really smells that good. GOOD GIRL will stay in my small, carefully selected handful of amazing perfumes. Its a bit of a spicy floral, but settles into a beautiful base note thats like a touch of magnolia. It also reminds me of Chanel No. 19, a classic thats hard to find anymore. GOOD GIRL is almost indescribableu2014long-lasting, delicious, a true *grown up* perfume thats perfect for date night, to spray on your sheets before bed, or for the office, where co-workers WILL ask you, u201cWhat is that scent youre wearing? I want it/want to give it to my girlfriend.u201d Yet its not too strong or overpowering. Its lovely, noticeable, memorable. To be honest, GOOD GIRL has released my inner bombshell! Expensive, worth every penny. The larger sizes come in a bottle shaped as a 6-inch stiletto pump. I really dont care for this packaging, so I think Ill transfer GOOD GIRL to a glass perfume bottle with a stopper.

reviews.review_text: I simply Love the packaging.... It doesnt hurt that it actually smell amazing. It smells like Old money but not too old.

reviews.review_title: For the Bad Girl in all of us!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, how about some applause for the name and bottle? Its called Good Girl but it's in a sexy stiletto bottle. You already know you're getting a unique play of contradictions here.  It doesn't disappoint. Good Girl (2016), an additive Oriental, has tuberose, roasted tonka bean, Sambac jasmine, cocoa, almond and coffee. For a split second, I thought there was amber in it (amber turns sour on my skin): Nope. The warmth is amber-free, and I get to enjoy the sexiness without consequences. I feel so bold wearing it. It's sweet, with a subtle spice to it. It's in between light and heavy (Carolina Herrera hit the right level for this) so this may be more appropriate for a date night out.    Received this as a free sample with my online order. I'm thinking about getting the 1.0 oz spray because I love the scent and the bottle will look so cute on my vanity.

Received this as a sample and Im very impressed. When It first sprays It is a little over powering but once on the skin you smell amazing. Its mature, deep, elegant, and absolutely wonderful. reviews.review_text: Being a self-proclaimed Shoenista, you can imagine my delight when I spotted this beautifully breath-taking perfume at one of Sephora's competitors.  As it wasn't stocked at Sephora at the time, I had to snatch this baby up right then and there.  The perfume is delectable and lasts all day.  It is a unique fragrance with multiple layers and notes of floral decadence.  The scent changes from the moment it is sprayed onto the skin and as you wear it throughout the day.  It becomes more subtle and feminine, but not diminished in intensity.  The bottle is stunning in itself and worth purchasing even if you do not like the perfume all too much.  The glass is thick and heavy and the whole piece looks like a sculpture that deserves a pedestal of its own on your vanity or dresser.  I even purchased the glitter bottle version.  This is an amazing item... purchase before it's gone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love every single thing about this fragrance. From the way individual notes are easily identified yet extremely well blended to the long lasting power and last but definitely not least its sex appeal. My husband is incredibly picky with fragrances, first time I wore this he spent the day with his face buried in my chest and other places. ;) Strangers have stopped to compliment me and demand to know what Im wearing. I thought Armani Code would be the one but I was too hasty with that review, it lasted all of two hours then faded to nothing. I'll chalk that up to fate bc Good Girl blows it out of the water! Eight hours later I'm still catching the scent when I move. I actually purchased a 17 piece sample set from Sephora in JC Penney (includes a voucher to redeem for a full bottle of your choice) there are some top notch designer scents included, thankfully this was one of them and is still #1 for me.  As a note of reference I do not care for cloyingly sweet scents or overwhelmingly floral perfumes nor do they work well with my chemistry. For example Prada Candy and Viva La Juicy were both included with the sample set and I despised them equally. But this concoction of jasmine, almond and tonka is heavenly. Good luck!

I do prefer this fragrance as a night out fragrance, but would not hesitate to wear it during the day either. Once on the body, the fragrance changes slightly to become a warm sensual scent (which differs from it's scent on paper). The bottle is beyond gorgeous. I'm wearing it currently, so I can't say the exact staying power yet, but I have a feeling it will last awhile. This is one of my favorite perfumes that has come out in a long time. It is in my area Sephora stores at the moment, so I am currently using the free sample, and encourage others to go try it out.

Wouldn't say its very long lasting but it smells a lot softer and more flowery after a few hours. Not to pleased with the price and the amount you get. I think you pay the price for the fancy bottle.

This is my daily perfume and I'm hooked. My husband loves it, too, and it seems to stay strong enough only for those close to me. Perfect for work because it's not offensive. My coworker who hates perfume loves the smell, too.

I love the flower soft smell and it stays all  day . Love how I'm at the store and I pass by and they are like you smell good ! Not all perfumes are like this. I just bought the small size to tried it out now I'm buying bigger size before they are sold out !!!

Love the smell and love the bottle design!

the bottle is gorg and the sprayer is a fine mist which i love! smells sooo good (: if you like floral sweet perfumes, id recommend it (: definitely doesnt smell like an old lady no chanel no. 5 vibes at all.

Unfortunately, there is nothing redeeming about this fragrance.  It's just BLAH and it would annoy me if I wore it all day.  If you collect perfume bottles and are independently wealthy, then go for it.  If not, I would suggest that you pass on this one.

I purchased it because of the bottle, but it doesn't smell good. I tried to like it, but it reminded me of a reed diffuser I use for my bathroom. My boyfriend sighed relief when I told him I was returning it. He said it smells like talcum powder and reminded him of an older woman. Definitely not what the black stiletto represents. I wish it smelled better. It dries down to a cheap drugstore scent.

I get more almond and cocoa from this scent with a powdery dry-down, so if you like gourmand, then this may be for you. It seems to fade fairly quickly - I've been wearing it for about 3 hours now, and I can still smell it, but I can no longer smell any of the floral notes.

So, so disappointed in this. Got an insert in the mail and loved it. Ran to the store, only to be let down. The fragrance immediately went to powder after application. Like the old-fashioned powder puff fragranced powder. I had such igh hopes.
Im definitely getting the bigger bottle

This is my new fragrance obsession! It smells so sexy and powerful. I'm considering it my 'boss lady' fragrance now. It lasts pretty well on me and I got lots of compliments when wearing this out. It almost starts out a little masculine smelling but settles to a sexy feminine scent so don't judge by first sniff let it dry down a bit before you make up your mind on it!

This perfume smells very nice but it's the quality of drugstore perfume. I honestly bought this for the bottle. I'm a fan of Carolina Herrera and thought the bottle design was beautiful. I thought the price seemed a little low for the quality I associate with Carolina Herrera but gave it a shot because the description of the scent sounded like exactly what I like in a fragrance. The scent lasts about 20 minutes on me- not before it fades but before it's completely gone! And that beautifully designed bottle is a total joke. The cap doesn't click shut and pops off so easily that after I apply it and put the cap back on it always falls on its side when I set it down. The golden heels is very cheap lightweight plastic, which I was not expecting! It's so light that there isn't really enough weight to balance the shoe. Just terrible. Carolina Herrera I am appalled you actually put your name on this.

This is seriously the best smelling perfume I have, and I have a lot. It smells like it could almost be unisex! It's feminine but masculine at the same time, I love it. Sometimes wearing super sweet girly perfumes to work isn't ideal. I ordered this without even smelling it because the bottle was so unique, and the smell is just as unique! I hope they start selling a larger bottle.

I wish the world could experience this breath taking fragrance!!! I absolutely love it!! It smells sooo good, feminine, it's long lasting, the bottle screams sexy, grown and maybe a splash of naughty...
Great fragrance, I love how it smells, Beau and very floral without being to strong, and lingers for a while.
Works very well with my skin chemistry......it sure turns heads.  Packaging is AMAZING. It smells AMAZING.
Just the packaging alone needs a 5 star, the smell is sexy, sophisticated and LASTING! great value for such a quality perfume (Unlike Ford's expensive and short lived smell)!
I love this perfume so much. I use it every day. It is the best perfume. I suggest to everyone to try it.
This is the epitome of sexy stiletto..I feel sexy just by holding it in my hand lol. The perfect gift for a shoelover! The smell is AMAZING.. which makes it the complete ideal package!

First off the packaging alone is enough reason to buy it for any girl who loves her shoes. I love having it out on display I bought several for that reason. However the bonus is the perfume itself is lovely it's soft it's nice it wears evenly no strong overpowering smell. Absolutely love this product!

I really like this fragrance. Beyond the beautiful bottle, I find it's light enough to use at daytime but sexy and sweet. Many people compliment me on this fragrance when I wear it and my fiancee loves it too.
Its the perfect woman fragrance a little mysterious and such a perfect bottle too cute to pass up!
Love this light and fruity scent. Reminds me a lot of Juicy Couture.

The girl at Sephora kindly gave me sample of it...and at first spritz it smells warm, inviting, vanilla, maybe cinnnamon even, then it transform into masculine smell.  hence why it should be renamed good man LOLi literally thought i had sprayed my brothers cologne on me lol. ....also the shoe  is not very spritz friendly.. anyway 3 stars for the initial scent and creativity of the shoe...otherwise....i wouldn't purchase this.
The bottle is stunning to say the least! But sadly , the smell is less impressive than the bottle.

Yes, I brought this because of the shoe but when you press for the perfume, you get a sweet spray of love, seduction and caramel; and of course your man comes to find who is eating all the sweets and not sharing!  Must have for those who love sweet but passionate perfume!
It's so sweet and floral  I like it very much

Not bad at all! I've had this for awhile now, purchased out of extreme curiosity with all the hype in the fragrance world. Very floral and extremely sweet. I get mostly tuberose and tonka bean from this. If I were to wear it regularly, it would be reserved for evenings although I do not consider Good Girl a sensual fragrance. While it is a bit pricier, it does last quite awhile on the skin.
